casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hargrove, Appellant.
Submitted November 10, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
WilUe Hargrove, appellant, in propria persona.
W. Mark Sendrow and James D. Crawford, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1970:
